exceptions.tactic: intros m z t Hmap Hexp.

exceptions.exn: The reference Hexp was not found in the current environment.
Wrong bullet -: Current bullet - is not finished.
The reference Hexp was not found in the current environment.

original: intros m z t Hmap Hexp. split. - intro H. apply (proj1 (Hexp (z) (t))). apply H. - intro H. specialize (proj2 (Hexp z t) H). destruct H as [H1 H2]. split. apply H1. destruct (Iter_upb m z) as [p Hp]. exists p. split. apply Hp. apply H2.
